version.title: arel load errors running active_record tests

version.body:
This patch seems to assume `arel` is in the root directory of the Rails repository, but it's not. Also, `arel` can easily be installed with `bundle install` - it'll fetch head directly from the Git repository.
This ticket can be closed.
